product_name: Scarpa Manali GTX Backpacking Boots - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed specifically for women, the Scarpa Manali GTX backpacking boots supply sturdy performance and a secure fit so you stay firmly on your feet while taking on challenging terrain. Women-specfic design features increased toe volume and narrower heel and instep for a snug, secure fit; over-the-ankle coverage remains flexible for freedom of movement. Flexible suede leather and nylon mesh uppers provide excellent durability and breathability; rubber rands help protect feet against bumps and abrasion. Gore-Tex(R) waterproof membranes let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and comfortable. Nylon linings quickly wick moisture away from feet while the anatomically shaped insoles provide light cushioning underfoot. Lightweight polyurethane midsoles provide additional cushioning; polyethylene plates ensure all-terrain stability and support. Vibram(R) Biometric rubber outsoles on the Scarpa Manali GTX backpacking boots deliver excellent stability and traction. Closeout.
short_description: Designed specifically for women, the Scarpa Manali GTX backpacking boots supply sturdy performance and a secure fit so you stay firmly on your feet while taking on challenging terrain.
